Reviews.Content: stayed regal oriental hotel 3nights value stayed access regal iclub lounge 3 pcs bunch magazines books tv light refreshments enjoyed reaching lounge grab fruit juice chat checkin checkout fast hassle breakfast included rate nearby restaurants cuisine thai food indian food typical hong kong snacks advise staff

Reviews.Content: expensive value clean tidy maid cheerful helpful near subway train buses mini bus taxi difficult hk easily access asian food outlets boring staff informative advise everythings

Reviews.Title: “Superb hotel with great ambiance”
Reviews.Author: ardeshir46
Reviews.Content: hotel self looks majestic grand entrance looks stunning night lighted looks location shopping restaurants main downtown spacious modern service polite wat help hotel lobby liked roomy types furniture shapes food huge selection food hotel stay enjoy

Reviews.Title: “Location is a negative...but value for money”
Reviews.Author: rahulzz1983
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 days althought hotel close mtr major tourist attractions easily using bus 25m kowloon tong tourist locations close central hong kong tsim tsa sui travelling upto central 20 mins mtr ride size decent compared similar priced hotel location closer central hk faced availability food vegeterian food options menu indian restaurant walking distance hotel value money

Reviews.Title: “Bad Location and run down hotel”
Reviews.Author: madsethi
Reviews.Content: hong kong couple days april 2010 booked regal oriental hotel kowloon booked deluxe check 3rd floor shock lives travelled world extensively seen literally 8 feet 6 feet bed stuck window tiny little attached bath deluxe left reception confronted girl regarding paid cut story short finally 13 nice hotel tried palm cubby hole location hotel bad near metro station taxi bus nearest staff buffet breakfast mediocre stay recommend dont

Reviews.Title: “terrible stay 3 days 2 night”
Reviews.Author: kl0900
Reviews.Content: im student 23 hotel check 45pm friend stay check clean stay look clean bed terrible bed inside bedbug 30 bite body firstly mosquito friends told bed crowded bite try hotel

Reviews.Title: “Fair hotel- would probably stay again”
Reviews.Author: bLueMnM
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights 4 days 3 star rating positives clean concierge friendly helpful understood english negatives probably space issues hk found receptionist unfriendly airport 451 hr ride airport free internet expensive tip 25 bus outside hotel kowloon mtr station 1520 minute ride dollars cheap mtr station literally quick efficient easy learn cheaper taxi dirt cheap coming airport book shuttle hotel taxi expensive public transportation hassle drag luggage walk outside hotel nearby shopping mall buy gifts probably cheaper price haggling night markets

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: devonsb
Reviews.Content: impressed hotel interiors children warn glass walls bathroom little inconvenient family decently spacious view hotel conveniently placed shopping destinations kowloon overall happy stay recommend

Reviews.Title: “Interesting hotel”
Reviews.Author: NbyNWalsall
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights flight cancelled previous hotel priced themselves market £50 pn regal oriental hayday kai tak airport hotel stranded centre clean little 1970s ok kids preferred novotel previously stayed concierge staff helpful business centre trying book flights hk price course breakfast nearby mcdonalds plenty local restaurants particularly thai locality unsafe oppressive vibrant taxi £45 tst reasonable six crammed nearby kowloon city park excellent kids hotel shuttle bus useful airport hassle taxis airport express probably wont stay theres location

Reviews.Title: “Clean Hotel... Not central but great staff”
Reviews.Author: Cotai_Traveller
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel week taking exams close reason decided stay kai tak note hotel staying facing highway prepared noisy night reason change staff unlike hk style upgrade hotel overall hk considered cheap recommend staying kowloon trip central 10 minutes walk mtr station 30 minutes mtr

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ellie654
Reviews.Content: ignore negative reviews booked agent hotel value money clean equipped free tea coffee mini bar mentioned central kowloon 19 girl travelling time feel threatened despite minority westerner mtr station 15 minutes walk hotel hong kong island pound hotel runs courtesy shuttle bus airport takes trips centre disney land overall hotel reccomend

Reviews.Title: “Good standard and friendly service”
Reviews.Author: LondonSenorita
Reviews.Content: hotel kowloon 20 mins taxi airport rebuilt port lots eat shop vicinity hotel 6 bus outside takes ladies market mongkok star ferry terminal worth upgrading premium breakfast included restaurants hotel pricey cafe basement selection pool gym booked tourist concierge worth quick visit city recommend night cruise lights shanghai visit gardens short walk hotel tranquil

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay”
Reviews.Author: savindrasingh
Reviews.Content: colleagues bussiness trip stayed 15 days found hotel staff professional service excellent clean tidy restaurant menu options available starting western indian chineese food quality excellent person cooking indian food person indian origin cook hotel transportation service available provide mini bus service

Reviews.Title: “Decent Place”
Reviews.Author: josh4amit
Reviews.Content: hotel regal oriental hong kong apart location main city attractions admire hotel hotel own charisma staff cooperative size decent added attraction indian restaurant nearby worst hotel central location little city attractions avenue stars disney etc food below average recommended vegetarians buffet breakfast worth overall decent stay transportation meals managed properly
